scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pieces included: 1 biographical letter (shared with Passages of Time and Awake, under a glass moon), 1 score. Notes: Envelope says: "To be returned". NA1.1 .04, NA1.2 .07; NA1.3 .06. Other address on return label: 925 Burton St. APT 9, Beloit, WI 53511.
